name: Warshade
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Your shadow comes to life in an adjacent empty space. It is a copy of you in your current condition, with shadowy versions of your current equipment that can't be removed or switched, and it takes its turn after you. It has all of your features and talents and styles and spells. It can only cast Shadow spells that don't require concentration, and it uses your MP for any spells it casts. It is under your complete mental control.

While this spell is active, either you or your shadow can pay 1 AP to pull either of you up to 60 feet towards the other.

Your shadow has hit points equal to your current hit points, and vanishes if it is reduced to 0 or fewer hit points.
